PlanWell is an application for organizing daily schedules, such as class timetables, assignment deadlines, or other reminders. Let\\\'s start logging your schedule so you won\\\'t forget anything! This app allows users to create a single note. The note cannot be saved, but it can be shared immediately after creation, if desired. Back The display below is for showing a scrollable list.
